item.title: 雪佛龙计划在石油产量下降的非洲地区恢复钻井作业
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）扩大了在尼日利亚和安哥拉等非洲石油生产国的勘探面积。【原文：Chevron Corp. has expanded its exploration acreage in African oil producers including Nigeria and Angola, where it sees the potential for a production revival despite years of decline.】

item.title: 芯片业认为美国的资金来源取决于大选
item.description: 今天的选举对一系列全球问题至关重要，其中最重要的是半导体行业的命运。但首先...【原文：Today’s election is pivotal for a litany of global issues, not least of which is the fate of the semiconductor industry. But first...】

item.title: 迪拜家族企业关闭在约旦的家乐福门店
item.description: 迪拜最大的家族企业集团之一正在约旦建立一家新的杂货零售商，一天前，该集团关闭了其在约旦经营的家乐福品牌商店。【原文：One of Dubai’s largest family-run conglomerates is setting up a new grocery retailer in Jordan, a day after it shuttered stores it operated in the kingdom under the Carrefour SA brand.】

item.title: 华尔街大选交易正面临关键时刻
item.description: 2016 年，当唐纳德-特朗普出人意料地战胜希拉里-克林顿，在全球市场引起反响时，亿万富翁投资者卡尔-伊坎（Carl Icahn）离开了凌晨举行的胜利派对，在股票上下了据说价值 10 亿美元的赌注，这就是著名的 "伊坎赌局"。股票在隔夜交易中大幅下跌，但伊坎坚信特朗普当选总统将提振华尔街。他很快就得到了证实。【原文：In 2016, as Donald Trump’s surprise win over Hillary Clinton reverberated across world markets, billionaire investor Carl Icahn famously left an early-hours victory party to place a reportedly $1 billion bet on stocks. Equities were buckling in overnight trading, but Icahn was convinced a Trump presidency would boost Wall Street. He was quickly vindicated.】

item.title: 津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 兑美元汇率扩大罕见升幅
item.description: 津巴布韦的黄金支持货币自 4 月份上市以来一直在外汇市场上遭受重创，在紧缩货币政策的支持下，该货币兑美元汇率连续第二天上涨。【原文：Zimbabwe’s gold-backed currency, which has been battered on foreign exchange markets since its April debut, rose against the dollar for a second day on the back of tighter monetary policy.】

item.title: 在法国足球交易腐败案调查中搜查 CVC 办事处
item.description: 法国金融检察官周二搜查了私募股权公司 CVC Capital Partners 和法国足球管理机构的办公室，这是对可能存在的腐败行为进行调查的一部分。【原文：French financial prosecutors searched the offices of private equity firm CVC Capital Partners and France’s football governing body on Tuesday as part of an investigation into possible corruption.】

item.title: 壳牌下季度开始改造德国最大炼油厂
item.description: 德国最大炼油厂的大修工程将于明年第一季度开始，这可能会减少壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）设施的原油处理量。【原文：The overhaul of Germany’s biggest oil refinery is set to start in the first quarter of next year, potentially reducing the amount of crude oil the Shell Plc facility handles.】

item.title: 挪威住房价格涨幅扩大，支持央行观点
item.description: 挪威上个月调整后的房价涨幅扩大，符合央行的预测，因为这个能源丰富的国家的家庭继续抵御高信贷成本。【原文：Norway’s adjusted home prices extended gains last month, matching the central bank’s projections as households in the the energy-rich country continue to defy high credit costs.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油运输量因北极和黑海运输量减少而下滑
item.description:
印度表示，如果价格合适，可能会采取更多措施

Drop comes as India says it could take more, if the price is right

】

item.title: 预算案后兰特波动飙升，南非进入倒计时
item.description: 投资者给南非联合政府留出了一定的余地，使其财政状况井然有序，但针对兰特下跌的对冲成本上升表明，在上周令人失望的最新预算公布后，压力正在增加。【原文：Investors are giving South Africa’s coalition government some leeway to get its finances in order, but the rising cost of hedging against rand declines shows pressure is building after last week’s disappointing budget update.】

item.title: 需求减少，柴油供应过剩问题日益突出
item.description: 据预测，今年全球柴油需求量将下降，这对于为全球经济提供大量动力的燃料来说实属罕见。【原文：The world’s demand for diesel is forecast to fall this year, a rare event for the fuel that powers swathes of the global economy.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司掉期持有者在复杂的债务谈判中组成集团
item.description: 似乎泰晤士水务公司的重组还不够复杂，与这家公用事业公司签署衍生品协议的银行又组成了一个小组，与这家陷入困境的公司进行谈判。【原文：As if Thames Water’s restructuring wasn’t complicated enough, banks that signed derivative agreements with the utility company have formed yet another group to negotiate with the beleaguered firm.】

item.title: 两名中国公民在巴基斯坦遭警卫枪击受伤
item.description: 警方发言人说，在巴基斯坦商业中心卡拉奇的一家纺织厂，一名保安开枪打伤了两名中国公民。【原文：A security guard shot and injured two Chinese nationals at a textile factory in Pakistan’s commercial hub of Karachi, an attack that is not linked to militancy according to initial probe, a police spokesman said.】

item.title: 美国即将举行大选，欧洲交易商寻求规避关税风险
item.description: 欧洲的交易商们正试图通过押注欧元，用瑞士法郎和德国债券来对冲风险，从而在至关重要的美国大选的余波中抢占先机。【原文：Europe’s traders are seeking to get ahead of the fallout from a pivotal US election by betting against the euro and hedging risks with the Swiss franc and German bonds.】

item.title: 孟加拉国要求马来西亚逮捕贩卖移民案中的商人
item.description: 孟加拉国警方要求马来西亚政府逮捕并引渡两名商人，作为涉嫌洗钱、敲诈勒索和贩卖移民工人调查的一部分。【原文：Police in Bangladesh have asked the Malaysian government to arrest and extradite two businessmen as part of a probe of alleged money laundering, extortion and trafficking of migrant workers.】

item.title: 埃及镑走软，因为当地贷款人批准了更多外汇申请
item.description: 埃及镑贬值至 1 美元兑 49 埃及镑，这是该北非国家自 3 月份实施大幅贬值以来第二次贬值。【原文：Egypt’s pound weakened to more than 49 per dollar for only the second time since the North African nation enacted a sharp devaluation in March.】

item.title: 环球音乐公司起诉 Believe 公司侵犯版权
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group NV）对法国唱片公司 Believe SA 提起诉讼，要求其赔偿至少 5 亿美元的版权侵权损失。【原文：Universal Music Group NV has filed a lawsuit against French record label Believe SA seeking damages of at least $500 million over copyright infringement.】

item.title: 交易商关注季末美国风暴，欧洲天然气进一步上涨
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格在周一跳涨后延续涨势，交易商正在关注一场晚季热带风暴可能会扰乱美国的燃料生产。【原文：European natural gas prices extended gains after a jump on Monday, with traders watching a late-season tropical storm threatening to disrupt fuel production in the US.】

item.title: 宽带公司 "香港宽带 "寻求约 8 亿美元贷款用于再融资
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，香港宽带服务提供商香港宽频有限公司正在寻求约 62.5 亿港元（8 亿美元）的贷款用于再融资。【原文：Hong Kong broadband service provider HKBN Ltd. is seeking an about HK$6.25 billion ($800 million) loan for refinancing purposes, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: Atos 同意以 2.7 亿欧元将 Worldgrid 部门出售给 Alten
item.description: 陷入困境的法国技术公司 Atos SE 一直在努力避免破产，该公司已同意以 2.7 亿欧元（2.94 亿美元）（包括债务）的价格出售其 Worldgrid 部门。【原文：Atos SE, the troubled French technology company that’s been fighting to avert bankruptcy, has agreed to sell its Worldgrid unit for €270 million ($294 million) including debt.】

item.title: 焦点转向美国大选，欧洲股市交易平稳
item.description: 欧洲股市变化不大，因为交易商的焦点转向了美国大选以及本周晚些时候即将到来的美联储决议。【原文：European stocks were little changed as traders’ focus turns to the US election and with the Federal Reserve decision looming later in the week.】

item.title: 中国市场疲软、工厂重组导致奥迪集团利润下滑
item.description: 由于中国奢侈品消费的减少以及布鲁塞尔工厂的重组拖累了回报率，大众汽车公司旗下以奥迪为首的高端品牌在第三季度勉强实现了营业利润。【原文：Volkswagen AG’s Audi-led premium brands barely eked out an operating profit in the third quarter after waning luxury spending in China and a plant restructuring in Brussels dragged on returns.】

item.title: SEB 交易员对巨幅降息预期反应平淡
item.description: 据 SEB AB 交易员称，瑞典央行很可能在本周加快宽松步伐，他们预计在周四宣布决定后，市场波动将受到限制。【原文：The Riksbank is likely to step up the pace of easing this week, according to SEB AB traders who expect market movements to be limited after the decision is announced on Thursday.】

item.title: 国泰航空有意从 2025 年起订购新远程喷气机
item.description: 国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd.）计划从明年起开始新一轮购买远程喷气式飞机的谈判，为未来十年的增长做好准备。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. plans to start a new round of negotiations to buy long-haul jets from next year as the airline looks to position itself for growth in the next decade.】

item.title: AB 食品公司利润大幅增长，推出新的回购计划
item.description: 英国联合食品公司（Associated British Foods Plc）的年度利润大幅增长，该公司表示，在投入成本降低的帮助下，其 Primark 服装连锁店和食品部门的发展势头有望在本财年继续保持。【原文：Associated British Foods Plc’s annual profit jumped and the company said momentum at its Primark clothing chain and food division is expected to continue this fiscal year, helped by easing input costs.】

item.title: 需求疲软，IPhone制造商鸿海10月销售增长放缓
item.description: 苹果公司的主要制造合作伙伴鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Apple Inc.’s major manufacturing partner Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. reported its slowest monthly sales growth since February, stoking concerns about demand momentum for both AI infrastructure and iPhones.】

item.title: 雪佛龙据说考虑出售香港加油站业务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，雪佛龙公司正在考虑出售其在香港的所有加油站，因为潜在投资者对此很感兴趣。【原文：Chevron Corp. is considering a sale of all of its gas stations in Hong Kong amid interest from prospective investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着扭亏为盈计划的推进，Orsted 下调了全年指导目标
item.description: 丹麦 Orsted A/S 公司略微收窄了全年盈利预测，因为在经历了糟糕的 2023 年之后，公司扭亏为盈的步伐正在加快。【原文：Denmark’s Orsted A/S slightly narrowed its full-year earnings forecast as the work to turn the company around gathers pace after a dreadful 2023.】

item.title: 瑞典 EQT 公司以 14 亿美元现金收购 OEM 国际公司
item.description: 私募股权集团 EQT AB 发起了对 OEM International AB 的竞购，以推动这家瑞典零部件制造商的并购增长。【原文：Private equity group EQT AB unveiled a bid for OEM International AB to drive M&A fueled growth for the Swedish component manufacturer.】

item.title: CVC的FineToday据称将为年底的东京IPO挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本个人护理用品企业 FineToday Holdings Co.【原文：Japanese personal-care business FineToday Holdings Co. has selected banks for a potential initial public offering that could take place as soon as before the year end, according to people familiar with the matter.】
